name: Alice in the Land of Hearts ~Wonderful Wonder World~
name_original: Alice in the Land of Hearts ~Wonderful Wonder World~
description:
Alice in the Land of Hearts ~Wonderful Wonder World~ is an adventure game developed by Otomate, prototype and QuinRose. It was originally released in 2007. It was published by Idea Factory.
Alice in the Land of Hearts ~Wonderful Wonder World~ is available on Nintendo Switch, PSP, PlayStation 2 and PC.
